content:
Sure! Here are some more recent uplifting anthems that have become popular:

1. "Good Days" by SZA - This song was released in 2020 and has quickly become a popular anthem of resilience and hope during difficult times.

2. "Levitating" by Dua Lipa - This catchy pop hit, released in 2020, has become an uplifting anthem of self-confidence and empowerment.

3. "Beautiful People" by Ed Sheeran ft. Khalid - This song, released in 2019, has become a popular uplifting anthem of acceptance and self-worth.

4. "Don't Give Up on Me" by Andy Grammer - This song, released in 2019, has become a powerful anthem of perseverance and hope in the face of adversity.

5. "Roar" by Katy Perry - This energetic pop hit, released in 2013, has become an enduring anthem of strength and positivity, empowering listeners to stand up for themselves and their beliefs.
